name: panic::print_stack_trace

core::fmt::Arguments::<'a>::from_str.doc:
Create a `fmt::Arguments` object for a single static string.

 Formatting this `fmt::Arguments` will just produce the string as-is.

console::early_print.doc: Prints formatted arguments to the console.

doc:
Prints the stack trace of the current thread to the console.

 The printing procedure is protected by a spin lock to prevent interleaving.
